feed.title: Port au Choix - Weather - Environment Canada

entry.title: WIND WARNING , Port au Choix
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:41 AM NST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: BLOWING SNOW ADVISORY , Port au Choix
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:45 AM NST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: -2.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Daniel's Harbour 11:30 AM NST Friday 23 December 2022
Temperature: -2.2°C
Pressure / Tendency: 103.6 kPa rising
Humidity: 71 %
Wind Chill: -6
Dewpoint: -6.7°C
Wind: ESE 11 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday: Mainly sunny. High minus 5.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 8 this morning and minus 13 this afternoon. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Friday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 7 with temperature rising to minus 3 by morning.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy near midnight. Wind becoming east 30 km/h gusting to 50 except gusting to 80 along parts of the coast overnight. Low minus 7 with temperature rising to minus 3 by morning. Wind chill near minus 13. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: Snow at times heavy or freezing rain. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow at times heavy beginning in the morning changing through ice pellets and freezing rain to rain in the afternoon. Blowing snow late in the morning. Snow and ice pellet amount 5 to 10 cm. Rainfall amount 2 to 4 mm. Wind southeast 40 km/h gusting to 60 increasing to 60 gusting to 80 except gusting to 100 along parts of the coast late in the afternoon. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 11 in the morning. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Friday 23 December 2022
